metadata.title: CURRENT OPINION Antimicrobial Agents are Societal Drugs How Should This Influence Prescribing?

abstract.original_text: consider the wider repercussions of their actions. It is accepted that in an ecological system, pressure will cause evolution; this is also the case with antimicrobials, the result being the development of resistance and the therapeutic failure of drugs. To an extent, this can be ameliorated through advances by the pharmaceutical industry, but that should not stop us from critically appraising our use and modifying our behavior to slow this process down.
